PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CoveringFlooring
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcCovering with the PredefinedType set to FLOORING.

PropertyDef.Name: HasNonSkidSurface
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the surface finish is designed to prevent slippery (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: HasAntiStaticSurface
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the surface finish is designed to prevent electrostatic charge (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
